snippet.title: Curse of the Deadwood Official Trailer : Coming this Summer!
snippet.description: Curse of the Deadwood is a unique couch co-op evolution of the twin-stick genre that will have you taking simultaneous control of two unlikely friends as they fight their way through hordes of wooden zombies. Balance a varied arsenal of long-ranged weapons with devastating melee and magic attacks. Only by working together will you be able to save the Woodlings’ beautiful world of Knottington from the Curse of the Deadwood. Add to your Steam® wishlist today!!! https://store.steampowered.com/app/362670/Curse_of_the_Deadwood/
